de.dfki.adom.rest.nodes

Class PayloadAppend

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.Restlet
      • de.dfki.adom.rest.nodes.Component
        • de.dfki.adom.rest.nodes.PayloadAppend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.restlet.Uniform

    public class PayloadAppend
extends Component

    A Component to append text to a block's payload via the REST interface.

    Represents the "payload/append" node in the REST tree and handles HTTP requests going there.

    Author:
    Christian Hauck
